title.ja: 偽小切手・過払い詐欺

short_desc.ja: 偽の小切手を送付し差額返金や商品発送を要求
short_desc.en: Send fake checks requesting refund of overpayment or goods

cultural_lever.ja: 銀行システムへの信頼・誠実な取引への期待
cultural_lever.en: Trust in banking system and expectation of honest dealings

scenario.ja: 1) 商品購入や仕事依頼 2) 過払い小切手送付 3) 差額返金要求 4) 小切手不渡り後に損失
scenario.en: 1) Purchase or job offer 2) Send overpayment check 3) Request refund difference 4) Check bounces causing loss

legal_notes.ja: 小切手詐欺は連邦犯罪
legal_notes.en: Check fraud is a federal crime
